day_1.name: DEBATE
day_1.description: Engage in a formal discussion on a topic of interest and develop critical thinking skills while advocating for your point of view.

day_1.name: J.A.M (ENGLISH)
day_1.description: Put your English language skills to the test in this fast-paced competition where contestants have to speak for one minute without hesitation, repetition or deviation.

day_1.name: WESTERN VOCAL
day_1.description: Showcase your vocal talent by singing a popular Western song and impress the judges with your performance.

day_1.name: RANGOLI
day_1.description: Get creative and showcase your artistic skills by creating beautiful, colorful patterns on the ground using colored rice, flower petals, or powder.

day_1.name: CLASSICAL DANCE
day_1.description: Perform a classical Indian dance style and express yourself through graceful movements, hand gestures, and facial expressions.

day_1.name: NACH BALIYE
day_1.description: Dance with your partner and showcase your chemistry and coordination in this couples dance competition.

day_1.name: STREET PLAY
day_1.description: Raise awareness on a social issue and convey a powerful message through this theatrical performance on the street.

day_1.name: DJ DHAMAAL
day_1.description: Get ready to dance and party as the DJ plays the latest and greatest music hits on the basketball court.

day_1.name: ON THE SPOT PAINTING
day_1.description: Express your creativity and imagination with On the Spot Painting. Test your artistic skills and win exciting prizes in this competitive event.

day_1.name: GROUP SONG (INDIAN)
day_1.description: An opportunity to showcase your singing skills with your friends. Come, sing your hearts out to Indian melodies and compete to win exciting prizes.

day_1.name: POETRY (ENGLISH)
day_1.description: Recite your favorite poem in English and captivate the audience with your delivery, intonation, and emotion.

day_1.name: INAUGURAL CEREMONY
day_1.description: The grand opening of Anugoonj 2023 with a spectacular ceremony featuring cultural performances and a keynote address by a distinguished guest.

day_1.name: RAP PERFORMANCE
day_1.description: Get ready to drop some beats and feel the rhythm with our electrifying rap performance evening - an unforgettable showcase of musical talent and energy!

day_1.name: PUNJABI NIGHT(SUKH-E)
day_1.description: Night featuring Sukh-E is a musical event with upbeat Punjabi music, dancing, and an energetic atmosphere. Come and enjoy the beats!

day_2.name: BATTLE OF THE BANDS
day_2.description: A musical competition featuring various bands who will showcase their skills in front of an audience and a panel of judges.

day_2.name: ONE ACT PLAY
day_2.description: A theatrical competition where teams will perform a short play that will be judged on the basis of various parameters like script, acting, direction, etc.

day_2.name: CHOREOGRAPHY
day_2.description: A dance competition where teams will showcase their creativity and talent through choreographed performances.

day_2.name: QUIZ
day_2.description: Get your thinking hats on and join us for an exciting quiz challenge. Test your knowledge and win exciting prizes!

day_2.name: CLASSICAL VOCAL SOLO
day_2.description: A classical vocal music competition where participants will perform solo pieces in front of a panel of judges.

day_2.name: CLAY MODELLING
day_2.description: Unleash your creativity with Clay Modelling! This event provides a platform to showcase your artistic skills and create beautiful structures with clay.

day_2.name: DEBATE (HINDI)
day_2.description: Engage in a thought-provoking debate in Hindi on a relevant topic and showcase your persuasion and critical thinking skills.

day_2.name: DJ DHAMAAL
day_2.description: Get ready to groove to the beats of our top DJs playing the latest party anthems and dance tracks all night long!

day_2.name: GROUP SONG (WESTERN)
day_2.description: Groove to the beat of western music with our talented participants performing their hearts out in this electrifying group song event.

day_2.name: FOLK DANCE
day_2.description: A cultural dance competition where teams will showcase their skills in performing traditional folk dances.

day_2.name: COLLAGE MAKING
day_2.description: Competition provides an opportunity to showcase your artistic skills by creating a unique piece of art with a mixture of materials.

day_2.name: JAM (HINDI)
day_2.description: An on-the-spot Hindi music competition in which participants will have to sing a song with a band provided by the organizers.

day_2.name: BAND PERFORMANCE
day_2.description: Experience an energetic and dynamic musical performance that will have you dancing and singing along to their original tunes and popular covers.

day_2.name: A MUSICAL BY RAS-RANG
day_2.description: Experience the magic of music with RAS-RANG, as they present a soulful and captivating musical performance that is sure to leave you mesmerized.

day_2.name: EDM NIGHT (RAVATOR)
day_2.description: Join us for a high-energy EDM Night featuring Ravator's electrifying beats, sure to get you on your feet and dancing all night long!

day_3.name: MR. & MS. ANUGOONJ
day_3.description: Mr. & Ms. Anugoonj is a highly anticipated competition where students showcase their talent, confidence, and personality on stage.

day_3.name: POETRY (HINDI)
day_3.description: Experience the magic of Hindi poetry in an electrifying session that will touch your soul and leave you mesmerized.

day_3.name: INDIAN LIGHT VOCALS
day_3.description: Indian Light Vocals is a soulful musical event that will take you on a melodious journey of Indian music.

day_3.name: FOOTLOOSE
day_3.description: Footloose is a dance competition where participants can showcase their best moves on the stage and compete against each other.

day_3.name: CREATIVE WRITING (HINDI)
day_3.description: Unleash your creativity in this Hindi creative writing competition and showcase your skills with the power of words.

day_3.name: CREATIVE WRITING (ENGLISH)
day_3.description: Unleash your creativity in this exciting English creative writing competition and put your writing skills to the test.

day_3.name: DJ DHAMAAL
day_3.description: Get ready to groove to the beats of the hottest DJs in town and experience an electrifying event of music at DJ Dhamaal.

day_3.name: CARTOONING
day_3.description: Unleash your creativity and bring your favorite characters to life in a fun and exciting cartooning workshop.

day_3.name: MONO ACTING
day_3.description: Step into the shoes of a character and showcase your acting skills in Mono Acting, a solo theatrical performance competition.

day_3.name: STREET DANCE
day_3.description: Put on your dancing shoes and show off your best moves in this exciting street dance competition.

day_3.name: TALENT SHOW
day_3.description: (Students with Special Needs) A showcase of talent featuring various performers from the university community.

day_3.name: STAR NIGHT(ARMAAN MALIK)
day_3.description: Experience an unforgettable musical journey with the sensational Armaan Malik, as he performs live at Anugoonj.
